testSteps.description: Then the server should respond with a status code of 200 (OK)
And the response body should contain an activity

children.description: Then The response contains an activity key should be not null
Then The response contains a type key should be not null
Then The response contains a participants key should be not null
Then The response contains a price key should be not null
Then The response contains a link key should be not null
Then The response contains a key key should be not null
Then The response contains an accessibility key should be not null

userStory.narrative:
As a user
  I want to know a random activity
  So that I can find something interesting to do when I'm bored
